description.ko: 살아있는 혈관을 통해 흐르는 빛의 리드미컬한 춤, 해저가 하나의 거대한 호흡하는 생명체가 되는 순간.
description.en: A rhythmic dance of light through living veins, where the ocean floor becomes a breathing organism.

prompt: Unreal Engine 5 render, Octane Render, 8k. A sprawling mycelial network of glowing emerald and amber tendrils weaving through submerged obsidian columns in a deep underwater atmosphere. Hyper-realistic bioluminescent organic shapes with liquid light flowing through semi-translucent membranes. Volumetric green light beams piercing through murky depths. Subsurface scattering on glowing tendrils, cinematic lighting, dramatic shadows, global illumination.
